notes: When I tried to open it, it crashed right after and a little pop-up showed up that read: Fatal error

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) HD Graphics 630 (Kaby Lake GT2)
notes: Was initially able to load, with the menus running smooth. However I had no video when the cinematics played. Once in game, the audio was out of sync and the framerate was pretty bad. Upon revisiting the game, I am unable to get back into my save. I will have to try reinstalling and tweaking some settings to see if anything changes.
systemInfoNotes: GTX 1050 (Using bumblebee to work around optimus)
title: Resident Evil Revelations 2 / Biohazard Revelations 2

notes:
English: I tried to know how a person could play in linux and I accidentally discovered it. There is a video file inside the "~ .steam / steam / steamapps / common / RESIDENT EVIL REVELATIONS 2 / nativePCNext / movie / ui /" folder, delete this file and play normally.
the videos of the game will not work, but the rest is perfect so far.
Português: Eu procurei saber como uma pessoa conseguiu jogar no linux e acabei descobrindo de forma acidental. Existe um arquivo de vídeo dentro da pasta "~.steam/steam/steamapps/common/RESIDENT EVIL REVELATIONS 2/nativePCNext/movie/ui/", apague este arquivo e jogue normalmente. 
os vídeos do jogo não vão funcionar, mas o resto esta perfeito até agora.
